guardian.title: Ukraine ceasefire in tatters as clashes escalate in east
guardian.topComment:
After long experience, I have this 'Acid Test' to determine the right side in any conflict:
- I look at who the Americans support, and it's the other side.
I was wondering a bit about ISIS, but then again, it is really a product of US blundering.

guardian.title: Lance Armstrong fined $10m for drugs lies in SCA Promotions case
Craig Hicks indicted over North Carolina shootings of three Muslim students
guardian.topComment: If it wasn't a hate crime against "others" who wore hijab, spoke another language, etc., and he was just angry at everybody in the complex who parked against his druthers, how come nobody else was executed? Why these three? Why that evening?
